Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class RmiClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.Client
      • it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.RmiClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RmiClientInterface, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class RmiClient
extends Client
implements RmiClientInterface
    This class represent a client using rmi connection and implements the Rmi-client interface exposed to rmi server.
